title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program Through Online Asynchronous Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Acquiring practical instructional design skills through case analysis and collaborative problem-solving in a smartphone-based asynchronous discussion environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to apply the ADDIE model at each stage by analyzing real-world educational cases
Learners can produce a report that incorporates peer feedback to improve instructional design solutions by at least 80%
Learners can solve complex instructional design problems by applying effective knowledge-construction strategies in asynchronous environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
